2.「刻印を 刻まれし者よ。| 汝の命……我らの供物として 捧げよう。: You who bears the mark. Offer your life to us.

4.しかし 突然のめまいに おそわれ|意識が 遠のいていく……。: But they are suddenly overcome with dizziness|and lose consciousness...

5.<cs_pchero>は 気を取り直すと|夢占い師の水晶玉を 清めた。: <cs_pchero> regained their composure and|cleaned the Dreamer's Crystal Ball.

6.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。 | あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐりて: O crystal ball, answer my plea. Pull the many|threads of fate, and show us the path we|must take!

7.「お前さん 夢の中で刻まれた刻印が| 現実の世界でも 胸に 刻まれたのじゃな？: You have the same marking on your chest in the|real world which was engraved in your dream,|don't you?

8.「すでに 予感しているかもしれんが| その刻印が 完成する時| そこに 待ってお: I'm sure you have at least an inkling of what|will happen once that mark is completed...

10.「……その刻印は 夢に現れた存在が | お前さんの 強い生命力に目をつけ| エモ:
That mark is one of a being that appeared to|you in your dreams. That same being realized|your strong life force, and now you're its|
|target.

11.「そやつは 多くの人々に 同じ悪夢を見せ| エモノを物色しているようじゃの。|:
It seems it is looking for something that will|force many others to experience the same|nightmare. You have been chosen as a|
|sacrifice...

12.「で お前さんに刻印を刻んだ存在だが……| ひょっとすると 名前くらいは| 聞い: So, the being that put that mark on you...|maybe you've heard of him, at least by his|name.

13.「その名は…… ダークドレアム。 | 夢の世界に君臨する 破壊と殺りくの神じゃ。: His name is... Nokturnus. He is a being of|death and destruction, and reigns in the world|of dreams.

14.「やつは エモノとなった者の生命力を奪うことで| チカラを増幅させ 夢の世界から: He most likely plans to invade this world by|stealing the life force of a sacrifice, which|will amplify his power.

15.「放っておけば 他にも 刻印の犠牲者は出よう。| 何より ドレアムが この世界に:
If left unchecked, many others will be|inflicted with that mark. There's no telling|what kind of destruction he'd bring to this|
|world.

16.「どうやら 紅衣の悪夢団とやらは やつを崇め | その手先となっている 集団のよ: It seems a group calling themselves the|Redcoat Nightmares work for and worship him.|They have me in their sights...

17.「ふぉっ ほっ ほっ。なに 心配するでない。 | わしが協力すれば 刻印の進行を: Ho ho ho. Don't worry. With my help, we can|stop the mark's progress and thwart their evil|schemes.

18.「だが…… 今すぐには 無理じゃ。| 夢占いは お前さんが思ってるより ずっと|: But... right now, I need to rest. Reading|dreams takes more energy than you may think.|Let us both rest for a while.

19.「お前さんにも やるべきことがあるようだね？| それが終わったら また ここへ戻: It looks like you have your own business to|attend to as well. Come here when you're done.|I'll forsee how to remove the mark then.

20.「……ふむ。どうやら 事態は| わしが 思っていたよりも 深刻なようじゃね。: Hmm... It seems the situation is more serious|than I thought...

21.「……我が供物よ。 | 運命に抗うことは できぬと知れ。: Know that you cannot resist your destiny,|my offering...

22.「……すべては 我らが 主のために。: ...all for the sake of our Lord.
